basics.label: Education Officer & Senior Education Officer, Guidance & Counseling Unit
basics.summary: Joined the Ministry of Education in 1982, served as Head of the Guidance Department. Supervised the Guidance & Counseling Unit, collaborated with the College of The Bahamas and Kent State University.

work.name: Ministry of Education
work.position: Education Officer & Senior Education Officer, Guidance & Counseling Unit
work.summary: Supervised the Guidance Counseling Unit. Developed and implemented programs to address the needs of the students and the employees.
highlights: Expansion of the Guidance & Counseling Unit
Establishment of a Master's of Education Degree Program in School Counseling
Implementation of the Employee Assistance Program (EAP)

work.name: R.M.Bailey Senior High School
work.summary: Head of the Guidance Department. Assisted students even after departure from the school.
